Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Includes certain pharmacists as qualified health care professionals and authorizing such pharmacists to complete a waived test
Summary: Includes certain pharmacists as qualified health care professionals and authorizes such pharmacists to complete a waived test and directs the commissioner of health to establish a list of CLIA-waived tests.
LawCode: Amd §§571, 579 & 206, Pub Health L; amd §6801, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the education law, in relation to including certain pharmacists as qualified health care professionals and authorizing such pharmacists to complete a waived test
